sentences.en: An Australian researcher has found your chances of becoming a professional sportsperson could depend on your birthday.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚一名研究人员发现，出生月份可能决定了你当职业运动员的机率。

sentences.en: The month of your birth influences your chances of becoming a professional sportsperson, according to Australian academics in a new study.
sentences.cn: 澳大利亚的一项最新学术研究表明，一个人出生的月份会影响其成为职业运动员的几率。

trans.tran_en: someone who takes part in sports or a sport
